isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Speakers W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper

svcproc.title: Bunk Speakers W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper
svcproc.para: A set of speakers, a volume control, and a headset jack is provided in these sleepers. This enables the radio to be listened to in the bunk through either the speakers or headphones so as to not bother the other driver.
